home.homeIntro: Welcome to my digital world! I’m a passionate web and mobile developer based in Montreal with over 5 years of experience. I specialize in React, React Native, and Node.js to create modern, user-focused applications. I also have a foundation in Python and experience building websites with WordPress. I love turning ideas into intuitive digital experiences—let’s build something amazing together!

aboutMeContent:
I’m a former electronic engineer who found her true passion in software development. Over the past 5+ years, I’ve worked on web and mobile apps using React, React Native, Node.js, and TypeScript. I enjoy collaborating with backend teams through RESTful APIs and transforming Figma designs into real, interactive products.

I thrive in Agile teams (Scrum, JIRA, Confluence) and always keep an eye on the latest trends. I’ve also created WordPress websites and have a solid foundation in Python. Outside of tech, I enjoy salsa dancing, discovering new places, and binge-watching great series.

contact.contactContent: Have a question, an idea, or just want to say hi? Feel free to drop me a message, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

projects.projectsContent: Discover a diverse array of intriguing projects that I've been involved in, either through collaboration or independent creation.

plastiq.projectDescription: Seamlessly manage, track, and unblock bills from anywhere. Keep your business operations smooth even on the go.

eqelonWeb.projectDescription: A dynamic real estate investment firm diving into ownership, development, and management of hotels and multifamily properties.

eqelonApp.projectDescription: Unleash new investment horizons with easy access to details, funds reports, and exploratory opportunities.

globant.projectDescription: Your gateway to a world of talent. Join our vibrant community through our recruitment site.

taskManager.projectDescription: Tackle your tasks with ease. Coordinate your to-dos, and priorities all in one organized hub.

weatherWeb.projectDescription: Stay ahead of the forecast. Get real-time weather updates and insights for your city and beyond.

pexelsWeb.projectDescription: A responsive video streaming app built with Next.js and React. It features a video list and a detailed player page with custom controls. The app uses the Pexels API to fetch videos and is styled with SCSS and modern UI components.
